reviewText: i purchase these "4-packs" alot as gifts. i attach a couple of candy bars and a box of micro-wave popcorn to the dvd with a ribbon and you have a great "movie night" gift for christmas or birthdays. best of all, the total cost is well under $15 bucks. i keep 4 or 5 on hand at all times for emergency gifts.

It's hard to find the lake house by it's self any more. My sister had not seen it yet. When I told her I had seen it 15 times she had to have a copy and I was more than happy to get it for her. After my wife of 45 years passed we reconected her and her husban great frends.

What could possibly be wrong with Keanu Reeves and Sandra Bullock in the same movie?  NOTHING!!  The Lake House is one of the most romantic and touching stories about love and the patience to wait for the right time.  It is a deep sigh and hand over the heart movie.  Those two are great together.  In Love and War is a strong true story about young Hemingway and and the women who is said to be the only true love of his life. Practical Magic is a fun romp with Nicole Kidman as Sandra Bullocks's younger wild sister (oh, and they are both witches) who brings her amusing troubles home.  Two Weeks Notice has Hugh Grant as Sandra BUllock's romantic antagonist. A light comedy that is a nice way to pass a night when the "boys" are footballing.  A good deal of value for price.  Glad I got it.
This is a great collection of bullock movies.  Looking forward to finding more of hers and various artists,  Thank you!!!

These movies are a lot of fun.  Getting them as a set for such a good price is a great find.
Received as expected.  I have never heard of or knew about this DVD before purchase.  Someone suggested it to me.
Sandra Bullock's recent showing in Gravity caused me to want to re-see her earlier work.  This gal has earned her spurs with a unequaled consistency in a highly competitive field.

This four pack arrived in pristine condition and much earlier than scheduled. It was brand new still in the plastic wrap. I am completely satisfied with them. The price was amazing - I could not have found these movies for this price in stores. I'm very happy.
These are four of my favorite movies right in one package.  I couldn't have asked for more from this purchase.

Saw 2 out of the 4 movies so far.  2 weeks notice and the Lake house were great.
These are great stories.  All of these actors had great performances.
I love Sandra Bullock & these are some of my favorite movies.  I like the variety of types put into 1 box.

8 hours of Bullock entertainment!  The Lake House is a lesser known but awesome film.  You have to watch it several times to really appreciate all the subtle twists and turns.  It gets better with each viewing.
This collection of movies is wonderful!  I went to order Practical Magic, which I love, but found this grouping instead.  So glad I bought it.  You will enjoy them, too!
Love Sandra Bullock and can watch her movies over and over. This was a great way to own 4 of her movies at a great price.
Great deal for 4 great movies. It's four films, that come in two DVDs. One on each side of the disk, I would have rather had four disks but non the less the movies were great.
I liked the early history of Hemingway.  I never knew about his World War I service before. Sad story but very moving.
The favorite of the four was "Two Weeks Notice"  Sandra Bullock and Hugh Grant are hilarious together!  Getting 4 movies for the price of one, who would want to pass that deal up.
I bought this because I wanted Practical Magic. I had seen Two Weeks Notice but not the other two movies. They were both syrupy sweet like all of her movies. Was a col find.
4 great movies packed into one DVD set at a great price. You can't ask for anything more, except more movies like this.
I think this is very well priced and am proud to be the owner of these movies . Recommed to all .
Great
I was very pleased to get 4 of her movies on one DVD instead of waiting for all of them to come separately!!

I have enjoyed seeing Sandra Bullock in other movies, however, the witchcraft mumbo-jumbo is not my bag.
I'm sorry, but this was also a dud in the bad language department. I couldn't get rid of it fast enough.
I like this idea. Saves space and four movies at a great price...very good idea indeed. I will buy more like this.

This DVD was purchased as an a part of the planned entertainment for a group of mature women on a ' Girls Only Weekend Get-away Trip '.....

I have watched "The Lake House" several times and love the story. I have only seen "Two Weeks Notice twice but I wanted to add it to my library. The other two movies I haven't seen. If you are Bullock fan I would also recommend "Gravity". Bullock gets into character and like Johnny Depp you forget you are watching Bullock rather than the character she is portraying.
My wife absolutely loves this set. Well worth the money spent just seeing her reaction while opening the package.
